@graph.name: Marine Omics visualisation
@graph.description:
From Obis data to Biodiversity indicators

## Associated Tutorial

This workflows is part of the tutorial [Obis marine indicators](https://training.galaxyproject.org/training-material/topics/ecology/tutorials/obisindicators/tutorial.html), available in the [GTN](https://training.galaxyproject.org)

## Features

* Includes [Galaxy Workflow Tests](https://training.galaxyproject.org/training-material/faqs/gtn/workflow_run_test.html)
